content:
The forces of Ukraine's defense last week, from March 18 to March 24, eliminated 5,000 Russian invaders (conditionally 10 battalions).

About thisinformsMilitary Media Center у Telegram.

Also, Ukrainian defenders were eliminated in a week:

  • tanks - 68 (conditionally 2 tank battalions*);
  • combat armored vehicles - 134 (conditionally 4 motorized rifle battalions*);
  • Artillery installations - 179 (conditionally 10 artillery divisions*);
  • rockets - 88.
1 Bat. ~ 500 people; 1 tank baht. ~ 31 tank; 1 Motorizhizh Bat. ~ 34 machines; 1 Art. Division ~ 18 guns.

As reportedArmyinformThe Armed Forces destroyed 11 Russian tanks per day and laid more than 600 invaders.
title: Defense forces for a week eliminated 5,000 personnel of the Russian Federation and almost 2 tank battalions
description: About it reports Military Media Center in Telegram. Also Ukrainian defenders for ...
author: Army Inform
